title: E-Commerce Platform
summary: A mini e-commerce experience built with Next.js, Stripe payments, and Sanity CMS for catalog management.
features: Product content managed via Sanity so non-technical teams can update easily
Responsive UI optimized for mobile shoppers

title: F&B CMS
summary: CMS for an F&B brand that needs tight control over menu, stock, and promos across branches.
features: Pixel-perfect slicing from Figma to reusable Next.js components
Internal API integration to sync menu items and inventory levels
Preview mode so marketing can review content before publishing

title: Hospital Admin
summary: Hospital administration dashboard that surfaces patient data, doctor schedules, and reports from a responsive UI.
features: Patient tables with advanced filters and exportable reports
Doctor schedule integration plus WebSocket notifications
Role-based access for admins, doctors, and finance teams

title: Credit Facility System
summary: Vue.js credit facility platform that manages drawdown and repayment workflows across currencies.
features: Multistep drawdown/repayment forms with strict validation
Interactive tables with expandable rows and CRUD modals
Multi-currency support with real-time allocation tracking

title: Logistics Management System
summary: Logistics dashboard for tracking shipments, SLAs, and order status in real time.
features: Shipment tracking with instant status updates
Integration with logistics APIs (order, warehouse, delivery)
Informative UI for operators with tables and visual status cues
